Welcome to the Artificial Intelligence Society (AIS).

The Artificial Intelligence Society is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation in Richardson, Texas. Our roots come from a student organization at The University of Texas at Dallas, which started in summer 2016. After six months of hosting events and giving presentations at high schools, the usefulness of a larger, more general AI organization became apparent. Thus, the nonprofit corporation was created in spring 2017. We are currently operating with support from HackDFW and Brainspace.

Thank you for your patience as we develop our website. In the meantime, please feel free to reach out to us at contact@aisociety.io or stay in touch using the form below.

Stay updated with our progress!
